price: 29. Elle fit signe alors (en direction du bébé). Ils dirent : « Allons-nous parler à un bébé au berceau ? »
arabic: فَأَشَارَتۡ إِلَيۡهِۖ قَالُواْ كَيۡفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-ashārat ilayhi qālū kayfa nukallimu man kāna fī al-mahdi ṣabiyyan
